name: Antidote (itch) (Rodulane)
description:
QUICK NOTE: For the best audio experience, play on a computer and not on a mobile device. Sometimes Pico-8 audio on mobile devices does not work very well. Enjoy!

-------

You have eaten very delicious-looking berries! Unfortunately, they seem to have been toxic! Not only that, the poison can only be stopped by a continuous cure.

Collect the antidotes (red potion) in order to survive just a little longer! And on the way, gain points as you pass through different places! There are also a few other items to look out for, such as the mysterious purple potion... and an unlikely ally who will give you advice as you fail (just don't tell your ally what the "ant"-idote is made of...) And perhaps you will be able to make it to the Quiet Lands: the final destination and the place of nothingness... There is much to discover in Antidote!

--------

Hopefully-Helpful Notes

+Be sure to turn on sound to hear the music!

+Be sure to read the Help page within the game!

+You only need to click an arrow key once to go that direction (just a single press, you do not need to keep pressing the arrow key)

+Play on a computer for the best audio experience

+Points are gained through certain potions and when you progress to a new area

---------

Made for Trijam #118, Theme: Toxicity

Made in Pico-8

Artwork, music, and code is original
